testDescription.name: Value list with inequality condition - IN Clause
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE address not IN ('Jerusalem', 'Batyam')

testDescription.name: testing minmax index with inequality condition
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE temp <> 0.1 and temp <> 1.1 and temp <> 2.2

testDescription.name: testing valuelist index on timestamp
testDescription.query: SELECT timestamp FROM sample WHERE timestamp IN (to_timestamp('2018-02-17T11:49:46.000Z'))

testDescription.name: testing minmax index on timestamp
testDescription.query: SELECT timestamp FROM sample WHERE timestamp > to_timestamp('2018-02-18T10:10:10.000Z')

testDescription.name: testing minmax index on string
testDescription.query: SELECT account_name FROM sample WHERE account_name > 'qqq'

testDescription.name: testing valuelist index on empty file
testDescription.query: SELECT account_name FROM sample WHERE account_name IN ('f6d')

testDescription.name: testing minmax index on empty file
testDescription.query: SELECT salary FROM sample WHERE salary > 9000

testDescription.name: testing all Na values in minmax index
testDescription.query: SELECT address FROM sample WHERE temp > 10

testDescription.name: testing all Na values in minmax index - negative value
testDescription.query: SELECT address FROM sample WHERE temp > -5

testDescription.name: testing all Na values in ValueListindex
testDescription.query: SELECT address FROM sample WHERE address IN ('H')

testDescription.name: testing all Na values in BloomFilter index
testDescription.query: SELECT address FROM sample WHERE address IN ('H')

testDescription.name: testing all Na values in ValueList and minmax index
testDescription.query: SELECT address FROM sample WHERE address IN ('H') and temp > 10

testDescription.name: testing all Na values in bloomfilter and minmax index
testDescription.query: SELECT address FROM sample WHERE address IN ('H') and temp > 10

testDescription.name: testing Na values in ValueList index
testDescription.query: SELECT address FROM sample WHERE address IN ('H')

testDescription.name: testing ValueList index of numbers
testDescription.query: SELECT temp FROM sample WHERE temp IN (21.1)

testDescription.name: testing bloomfilter index of numeric(integer)
testDescription.query: SELECT num FROM sample WHERE num IN (21)

testDescription.name: Value list with many conditions (for InSet check)
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE address IN ('Telaviv', 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g', 'h', 'i', 'j', 'k', 'l', 'm' , 'n', 'o', 'p')

testDescription.name: Bloomfilter with many conditions (for InSet check)
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE address IN ('Telaviv', 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g', 'h', 'i', 'j', 'k', 'l', 'm' , 'n', 'o', 'p')

testDescription.name: testing Na values in MinMax index
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE temp BETWEEN 0 AND 10

testDescription.name: testing skipped files
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE temp BETWEEN 0 AND 10

testDescription.name: testing skipped files, datasetpath ending with /
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE temp BETWEEN 0 AND 10

testDescription.name: minmax and valuelist in or clause
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE address IN ('H') or temp < 11.1

testDescription.name: testing minmax with lt (no border case)
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE temp < 10.1

testDescription.name: testing minmax index with equality condition
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE temp = 0.1

testDescription.name: testing minmax with lte (border case)
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE temp <= 10.1

testDescription.name: Indexing long ( > 256) value list
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE address IN ('Jerusalemmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmzzzz')

testDescription.name: minmax & valuelist indexing with various constraints
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE address IN ('Jerusalem') AND temp BETWEEN 0 AND 15

testDescription.name: index case sensitivity - sensitivity in query (to check filtering)
testDescription.query: SELECT address, temp FROM sample WHERE tEmP <= 10.1
